items.question: How can I cancel or change my payment?
items.answer: You can request a cancellation or change within 7 days of payment through customer support. For more details, refer to the terms of use.

items.question: What is the fee in KRW (South Korean Won)?
items.answer: The current fee in KRW starts at 9,900 KRW per month for the basic plan. Detailed pricing is available on the plan page.

items.question: What is the refund policy?
items.answer: Refunds are available only within 7 days of payment and if the service has not been used. Additional conditions may apply based on the terms of use.

items.question: How can I stop auto-renewal?
items.answer: You can disable the auto-renewal option in the account settings page. The cancellation will take effect after the current subscription period ends.

items.question: What payment methods are supported?
items.answer: We currently support various payment methods such as credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and KakaoPay.

items.question: How can I upgrade my subscription?
items.answer: Subscription upgrades can be done in the account settings under the plan change menu. The new plan will take effect immediately.

items.question: How can I check my subscription status?
items.answer: After logging in, you can check your current subscription status and the remaining period on the account settings page.

items.question: Are taxes included in the price?
items.answer: The displayed price does not include taxes. Additional taxes may apply depending on your region.

items.question: Can I use the service overseas?
items.answer: Yes, the service is available overseas. However, some payment options may be restricted in certain regions.

items.question: Can I share my account with others?
items.answer: Account sharing is prohibited by the terms of use. Each user should create their own account.

items.question: Is there a way to get a discount?
items.answer: Discounts may be available during promotional periods or by using certain payment methods. Check your email notifications for updates.

items.question: How can I downgrade to a different plan?
items.answer: You can downgrade by selecting the plan change option in account settings. Changes will take effect in the next billing cycle.

items.question: Will my data be retained after I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Your data will be retained for 30 days after cancellation. After that, it may be deleted, so please back up your data in advance if needed.

items.question: What should I do if my payment fails?
items.answer: If your payment fails, please check the registered payment information and contact customer support if the issue persists.

items.question: Does the plan include family sharing features?
items.answer: Family sharing features are available for premium plans or higher. Up to 5 members can share an account.

items.question: Where can I check my payment history?
items.answer: You can check your payment history in the 'Payment Information' section of account settings.

items.question: What should I do if I forget my password and can't access my subscription?
items.answer: You can regain access to your account by resetting your password. Additional support is available through customer service.

items.question: Is there a plan specifically for corporate users?
items.answer: Yes, a corporate plan is available. For more details, contact the sales team or check the plan page.

items.question: Will I be charged automatically after a free trial?
items.answer: After the free trial ends, the subscription will start automatically. If you don't want auto-renewal, cancel before the trial ends.

items.question: Can I pay in other currencies?
items.answer: Supported currencies vary by region. You can check the available currencies on the payment page.
